# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value for those who appreciate its unique features and benefits. Considering its quality and the effort put into it, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $200. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to ask. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
